abstract: Several factors could explain the disconnect between skyrocketing oil prices and the mediocrity of the stock performance of the three biggest American oil companies.
snippet: Several factors could explain the disconnect between skyrocketing oil prices and the mediocrity of the stock performance of the three biggest American oil companies.
lead_paragraph: WHO says everyone loves a winner? Big diversified oil companies are reporting enormous profits but they are receiving what seems to be a record amount of grief.

headline.main: Big Oil Is Owed Some Love
headline.print_headline: Big Oil Is Owed Some Love
